v1.10
- Add : Animation tracking feature
- Add : Additional filtering capabilities (including strings applicable filter)
	- Animation name
	- Event function name
	- Parameters (float, int, string)
- Fix : Toolbar menu -> Left Pivot, Right Pivot changes to the menu
- Fix : Edit UI design changes

v1.00
- Initial release
